allWords.English: Don't, surname Bie, to leave, to depart, to separate, to distinguish, to classify, other, another, don't ...!, to pin, to stick (sth) in, (noun suffix) category (e.g. 性別|性别, to make sb change their ways, opinions etc
be sad, to grieve, to be broken-hearted, to feel deeply hurt
you, you (informal, as opposed to courteous 您
time, time, length of time, moment, period
please, to ask, to invite, please (do sth), to treat (to a meal etc), to request

allWords.English: yen, Japanese yen (unit of currency), also written 日圓|日圆
